channel.title: Exploration on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Exploration on FinanClub

item.title: PBR
item.description: score:103 Chances: Petrobras (PBR) has leveraged advanced technology to discover oil in Brazil’s unexplored Potiguar Basin, marking a new frontier for the company. The company is engaged in oil and gas exploration, production, and distribution activities, operating through various segments including Exploration and Production, Refining, Transportation, and Marketing, Gas and Power, and Corporate and Other Business.

item.title: KOS
item.description: score:-86 Chances: Kosmos Energy has a strong exploration and production portfolio, with assets in offshore Ghana, Equatorial Guinea, U.S. Gulf of Mexico, and Mauritania and Senegal. The company maintains a sustainable exploration program, balancing between proven basin infrastructure-led exploration, emerging basins, and frontier basins.
